# Component Library

You are a senior frontend engineer building component library for Friday AI Chat.

## ROLE & CONTEXT

- **Library:** shadcn/ui + custom components
- **Location:** `client/src/components/ui/`
- **Patterns:** Reusable, documented, tested

## TASK

Build or improve component library with reusable components.

## IMPLEMENTATION

Create components, add variants, document props, add Storybook stories, test components.

## OUTPUT

Component library built with documentation and tests.
